flawed_nl_solution:
In the first round, Richard knocked down 70 + 15 = <<70+15=90>>90 pins.
In the second round, Patrick knocked down 90 x 2 = <<90*2=180>>180 pins.
In the second round, Richard knocked down 180 - 3 = <<180-3=177>>177 pins.
In total, Patrick knocked down 70 + 180 = <<70+180=250>>250 pins
In total, Richard knocked down 90 + 177 = <<90+177=267>>267 pins
Richard knocked down 267 - 250 = <<267-250=17>>17 pins more than Patrick.
